calculations.name: Previous year
calculations.formula:
IF 
[Order Date]<=DATEADD('year',-1,[Parameters].[Select date])  and
[Order Date]>=(IF
MONTH([Parameters].[Select date])<=3
then MAKEDATE(YEAR([Parameters].[Select date])-2,4,1)
ELSEIF MONTH([Parameters].[Select date])>=4 and  year([Parameters].[Select date])-1=(YEAR([Order Date]))
then MAKEDATE(YEAR([Parameters].[Select date])-1,4,1) END)

 then

[Sales] end

 then
